mapper.select: select a.*, u.username, u.avatar from article_tag at left join article a on at.article_id = a.id left join tag tag on at.tag_id = tag.id left join user u on a.user_id = u.id where tag.id = #{tagId}
SELECT tag.* FROM article_tag AT LEFT JOIN tag ON tag.id = at.tag_id GROUP BY tag_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC limit #{topTagNum}
